kiwi.ui
Class KTable

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTable
                  kiwi.ui.KTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CellEditorListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener
public class KTable
extends javax.swing.JTable

An extension of JTable that fixes a number of blatant bugs and limitations in that component.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

createDefaultColumnsFromModel

public void createDefaultColumnsFromModel()

getRowTranslation

public int getRowTranslation(int row)
Get the row translation for a given row in the table. If sorting is turned on, the visual row may not be the same as the row in the underlying data model; this method obtains the model row corresponding to the specified visual row, whether sorting is turned on or not.

Parameters:
row - The visual row.
Returns:
The corresponding row in the data model.

setModel

public void setModel(javax.swing.table.TableModel model)
Set the data model for this table.

Parameters:
model - The new model.

prepareHeader

private void prepareHeader()
Prepare the header to use the custom header renderer.

setEnabled

public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
Enable or disable this table. A disabled table cannot be edited or sorted, nor can the selection be changed, nor the columns reordered or resized.

setEditable

public void setEditable(boolean editable)
Set the editable state of this table.

Parameters:
editable - A flag specifying whether this table is editable.

isEditable

public boolean isEditable()
Determine if the table is editable.

Returns:
true if the table is editable and false otherwise.

setSortable

public void setSortable(boolean sortable)
Set the sortable state of this table.

Parameters:
sortable - A flag specifying whether this table is sortable.

isSortable

public boolean isSortable()
Determine if the table is sortable.

Returns:
true if the table is sortable and false otherwise.

isCellEditable

public boolean isCellEditable(int row,
                              int col)
Determine if a cell is editable. Editability of a given cell is ultimately determined by the table model, unless the table has been made non-editable via a call to setEditable(), or if it has been disabled via a call to setEnabled().

Parameters:
row - The row of the cell.
col - The column of the cell.
Returns:
true if the cell at the specified coordinates is editable, or false if it is not editable or if the table has been made non-editable.
See Also:
setEditable(boolean)

ensureRowIsVisible

public void ensureRowIsVisible(int row)
Scroll the table to ensure that a given row is visible.

Parameters:
row - The row that must be visible.

stopEditing

public void stopEditing()
Stop any cell edit that is in progress on the table.
